title: Reese Witherspoon keeps it casual in pink blouse and jeans as she steps out for coffee in LA
text:
Reese Witherspoon spent her Wednesday afternoon grabbing some coffee with friends in Los Angeles.

The 43 year old actress was spotted giving a female friend a hug while checking out something on a male friend's phone.

The Legally Blonde star sported a breezy and casual look for her mid-week outing with friends.

Coffee: Reese Witherspoon spent her Wednesday afternoon grabbing some coffee with friends in Los Angeles

Reese's look: The 43 year old actress was spotted giving a female friend a hug while checking out something on a male friend's phone

Witherspoon was wearing a pink sleeveless top with tiny black designs all over it, as she carried a beverage outside.

Her pink top was tucked into a pair of light blue jeans, with white Golden Goose sneakers and gold hoop earrings for her outing.

She completed her look with a pair of black sunglasses with a tan bag slung over her shoulder.

Reese's look: Witherspoon was wearing a pink sleeveless top with tiny black designs all over it, as she carried a beverage outside

Witherspoon is coming off the second season of the hit HBO series Big Little Lies, which most likely will not return for a third season.

She will return with a new series entitled The Morning Show, with Jennifer Aniston, which is among the flagship shows on the new Apple TV Plus streaming service.

She is also slated to return as Elle Woods in Legally Blonde 3, a sequel to her 2001 hit Legally Blonde and its 2004 follow-up Legally Blonde: Red White and Blonde.

Coming soon: Witherspoon is coming off the second season of the hit HBO series Big Little Lies, which most likely will not return for a third season

Witherspoon is also starring in and producing a mini-series adaptation of Celeste Ng's novel Little Fires Everywhere for Hulu.

She also produces the upcoming drama Lucy In the Sky, starring Natalie Portman as an astronaut who loses touch with reality after returning to Earth.

Witherspoon also produces The Dry with Eric Bana and Penguin Bloom with Naomi Watts and Andrew Lincoln.

Mini-series: Witherspoon is also starring in and producing a mini-series adaptation of Celeste Ng's novel Little Fires Everywhere for Hulu

Producer: She also produces the upcoming drama Lucy In the Sky, starring Natalie Portman as an astronaut who loses touch with reality after returning to Earth

Witherspoon has been married to Jim Toth, a talent agent, since 2011, and she was previously engaged to actor Ryan Phillippe.

The actress shares two kids with Phillippe, Ava, who just turned 20 last month, and Deacon, who turns 16 this month.

Witherspoon and Toth have one son together, Tennessee, who just turned six years old last week.
description: Reese Witherspoon spent her Wednesday afternoon grabbing some coffee with friends in Los Angeles.
